task.summary: Default task
Added functions clean the data: Fix individual errors in the data, turn .txt annotation files into csv and combine them.
Added functions to create a list of the edf data for a patient and move it to a combined folder. Additionally, fixed multiple individual errors in the data.
Seizure competition data is now also renamed and documented
Removed uv files
Made config use classes for better organization
Made config use classes for better organization
Added function to assert that the sample frequency is the same for all files
Added a function to compute the segments and improved copy_uneeg_data.py
Added a function to compute the segments and improved copy_uneeg_data.py
Created a new Paths class to represent the folder structure
annotations_to_csv.py now interprets Seizure_Start and Seizure_End correctly
Created a script that check for duplicate seizures
Added multiple column names
Created estimate_seizure_starts.py to estimate seizure starts from single markers
Created estimate_seizure_starts.py to estimate seizure starts from single markers
Added valid_patients.py to check which patients have enough seizures for further analysis
valid_patients.py now stored dataset for patients
Windows are now based on the (estimated) seizure start. Invalid patients are moved to a new dir
Now representing intervals with the Interval class. Added generation of fake data for testing.
Made validate_patients.py use the preictal + horizon to determine valid seizures
Added segment_tables.py to create the full segment table with types
Created the models in jupyter
moved combine_annotations.py to data_cleaning
Added combine_annotations to data_cleaning main.py
Added combine_annotations to data_cleaning main.py
Added extract_features.py to extract segment features
Made the base main.py complete the current steps
Added hello_world.py to .gitignore
Added an option to include invalid patients for Paths.patient_dirs. Updated tests and added test_paths.py and test_combine_annotations.py
Added placeholder.txt so that PyCharm syncs the parent folders to the server
Parallelized segment_tables.py, corrected bugs in estimate_seizure_starts.py and validate_patients.py, let validate_patients.py determine patient timespan info
Fixed a bug where Paths.patient_dirs() wouldn't show invalid patients.
Added make_segs_table_and_plot which can make plots for all patients
Added a title to the plots
subfolders and files now return Path type, instead of PatientDir / Paths type
created compare_all_seizures.ipynb to find duplicated seizures between patients
Add patient validation based also on time span info
Updated gitignore's
